url.title: ONLYOFFICE Docs address
url.description: Here, please specify the address of your ONLYOFFICE Docs server.

security-key.title: ONLYOFFICE Docs secret key
security-key.description: Use the auto-generated JWT secret key or set your own here and the same one in the ONLYOFFICE Docs config file.

security-header.title: Authorization header
security-header.description: Leave blank to use default header

demo.title: Connect to demo ONLYOFFICE Docs server
demo.description-active: You are successfully connected to the demo server. It will be available until {time}. To disable it, uncheck the box.
demo.description-availabale: This is a public test server, please do not use it for private sensitive data. The server will be available during a 30-day period.
demo.description-not-availabale: The 30-day test period is over. You are no longer able to connect to the demo server.

messages.save-settings-failed: Error saving settings, please try again

main.title: Welcome to ONLYOFFICE!
main.description: Create and open attachments from your space. All files from Content and Blogs will appear here. To create a new file, click to any page and press Create button.

messages.please-save-changes: Please make sure to save any changes to prevent data loss.
messages.editor-will-be-reloaded: The editor will be reloaded to continue working in ({time}).
messages.stop-editing-by-cause-session-expired: Editing of this document has been stopped because the current session has expired.
messages.update-session-failed: Unfortunately, it was not possible to extend the session.
messages.you-using-demo-server: You are using the public demo server of ONLYOFFICE Docs. Please avoid storing any private or sensitive data.

common.title: App loading error
common.description: An unexpected error occurred while loading the application. Please reload it to continue.

not-found.title: We couldn't find what you're looking for
not-found.description: It may have been deleted, the URL could have a typo in it, or you may need to log in to view it.

docs-api-undefined.title: Document Server Error
docs-api-undefined.description: Failed to connect to the ONLYOFFICE Document Server. Please check your server configuration.

search.title: Nothing found
search.description: We couldn't find any content with that title

list.title: No docs here yet
list.description: Create a new document by clicking Create button

delete-attachment.title: Delete attachment
delete-attachment.description: Are you sure you want to delete "{filename}"?

notifications.attachment-create-failed: Failed to create attachment. Please try again.
notifications.attachment-delete-failed: Failed to delete attachment. Please try again.

docs-cloud-banner.description: Easily launch the editors in the cloud without downloading and installation
